languages.text: В колонии кризис власти: нынешний губернатор слаб, а дворяне поглощены борьбой за влияние и почти забросили управление планетой.
The colony is facing a leadership crisis: the current governor is weak, and the nobles are engaged in a power struggle and have all but forgotten governing the planet.
languages.original_text: В колонии кризис власти: нынешний губернатор слаб, а дворяне поглощены борьбой за влияние и почти забросили управление планетой.

traits.locale_text: The colony faces a crisis of authority: the current governor is weak, and the nobles are engaged in a power struggle and have all but forgotten about governing the planet.
The von Valancius dynasty was publicly insulted by the colony's governor!
The colony is facing a leadership crisis: the current governor is weak, and the nobles are engaged in a power struggle and have all but forgotten governing the planet.
The von Valancius dynasty was publicly insulted by the colony's governor!

The colony faces a crisis of authority: the current governor is weak, and the nobles are engaged in a power struggle and have all but forgotten about governing the planet.
The colony is facing a leadership crisis: the current governor is weak, and the nobles are engaged in a power struggle and have all but forgotten governing the planet.
The colony is facing a leadership crisis: the current governor is weak, and the nobles are engaged in a power struggle and have all but forgotten governing the planet.
The colony is facing a leadership crisis: the current governor is weak, and the nobles are engaged in a power struggle and have all but forgotten governing the planet.

languages.text: Les autorités de la colonie sont en pleine crise : le gouverneur actuel est faible, et les nobles engagés dans une lutte de pouvoir ne songent plus du tout à administrer la planète.
languages.original_text: The colony is facing a leadership crisis: the current governor is weak, and the nobles are engaged in a power struggle and have all but forgotten governing the planet.

traits.locale_text: Les autorités de la colonie sont en pleine crise : le gouverneur actuel est faible, et les nobles engagés dans une lutte de pouvoir ne songent plus du tout à administrer la planète.

languages.text: コロニーは指導力における危機的状況に直面している。現在の総督は弱く、貴族たちは権力闘争に明け暮れており、この惑星を統治することをすっかり忘れてしまっている。
languages.original_text: The colony is facing a leadership crisis: the current governor is weak, and the nobles are engaged in a power struggle and have all but forgotten governing the planet.

traits.locale_text: コロニーは指導力における危機的状況に直面している。現在の総督は弱く、貴族たちは権力闘争に明け暮れており、この惑星を統治することをすっかり忘れてしまっている。

languages.text: 这个殖民地正面临着领导层危机——现任总督软弱无能，而贵族阶级忙于权力斗争，完全忽视了治理殖民地的责任。
languages.original_text: The colony is facing a leadership crisis: the current governor is weak, and the nobles are engaged in a power struggle and have all but forgotten governing the planet.

traits.locale_text: 这个殖民地正面临着领导层危机——现任总督软弱无能，而贵族阶级忙于权力斗争，完全忽视了治理殖民地的责任。

languages.text: La colonia se enfrenta a una crisis de liderazgo: su gobernador actual es débil y los nobles están enzarzados en una lucha por el poder, olvidando su labor de gobernar el mundo.
languages.original_text: The colony is facing a leadership crisis: the current governor is weak, and the nobles are engaged in a power struggle and have all but forgotten governing the planet.

traits.locale_text: La colonia se enfrenta a una crisis de liderazgo: su gobernador actual es débil y los nobles están enzarzados en una lucha por el poder, olvidando su labor de gobernar el mundo.

languages.text: Die Kolonie steht vor einer Führungskrise: Der aktuelle Gouverneur ist schwach und die Adligen sind in einen Machtkampf verstrickt, über den sie es fast völlig vergessen haben, dass sie den Planeten noch verwalten müssen.
languages.original_text: The colony is facing a leadership crisis: the current governor is weak, and the nobles are engaged in a power struggle and have all but forgotten governing the planet.

traits.locale_text: Die Kolonie steht vor einer Führungskrise: Der aktuelle Gouverneur ist schwach und die Adligen sind in einen Machtkampf verstrickt, über den sie es fast völlig vergessen haben, dass sie den Planeten noch verwalten müssen.

languages.text: Koloni, liderlik kriziyle karşı karşıya: Mevcut vali zayıf, soylular ise güç savaşına o kadar dalmış ki gezegeni idare etmeyi unutmuş durumdalar.
languages.original_text: The colony is facing a leadership crisis: the current governor is weak, and the nobles are engaged in a power struggle and have all but forgotten governing the planet.
